channel.title: [pi] first log!
channel.description: hey guys, currently when a new player log onto the server they haft to go to the make over mage to edit there players. i wish to make it so when a player "first" log's onto the server the ::char edit comes up it self so if anyone can help me im using pi base. thanks

item.title: [pi] first log!
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

do you know how to make it so after your first log it doesnt come up anymore? so once that account has been logged in once the char editor wont come up again. thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] first log!
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Client.java

search for code[/code]

Under that paste getPA().showInterface(3559); canChangeAppearance = true;

Read full topic
